quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Don’t settle for a relationship that won’t let you be yourself.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I’m selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can’t handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don’t deserve me at my best.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Only time can heal your broken heart, just as only time can heal his broken arms and legs.
author: Miss Piggy

quote: Sexiness is a state of mind – a comfortable state of being. It’s about loving yourself in your most unlovable moments.
author: Halle Berry

quote: We love the things we love for what they are.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Better to have lost and loved than never to have loved at all.
author: Hemingway

quote: It’s better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: The greater your capacity to love, the greater your capacity to feel the pain.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. That’s what I hope to give you forever.
author: The Notebook

quote: Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable.
author: Wizard of Oz

quote: It was a million tiny little things that, when you added them all up, they meant we were supposed to be together… and I knew it.
author: Tom Hanks, Sleepless In Seattle

quote: Love means never having to say you’re sorry.
author: Ali MacGraw, Love Story

quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: To be brave is to love unconditionally without expecting anything in return.
author: Madonna

quote: Your heart is free, have the courage to follow it.
author: Braveheart

quote: I refuse to let what happened to me make me bitter. I still completely believe in love and I’m open to anything that will happen to me.
author: Nicole Kidman

quote: Love to me is someone telling me, ‘I want to be with you for the rest of my life, and if you needed me to I’d jump out of a plane for you.’
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that’s beautiful.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: Don’t forget I’m just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her.
author: Notting Hill

quote: You don’t marry someone you can live with – you marry the person who you cannot live without.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is just a word, but you bring it definition.
author: Eminem

quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart, and the senses.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Pleasure of love lasts but a moment. Pain of love lasts a lifetime.
author: Bette Davis

quote: Men are a luxury. Not a necessity.
author: Cher

quote: Love is a promise; love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear.
author: John Lennon

quote: Life is messy. Love is messier.
author: Catch and Release

quote: I’m scared of walking out of this room and never feeling the rest of my whole life the way I feel when I’m with you.
author: Dirty Dancing

quote: You know it’s love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you’re not part of their happiness.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: A book without words is like love without a kiss; it’s empty.
author: Andrew Wolfe

quote: Love is absolute loyalty. People fade, looks fade, but loyalty never fades. You can depend so much on certain people; you can set your watch by them. And that’s love, even if it doesn’t seem very exciting.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: The heart wants what it wants. There’s no logic to these things. You meet someone and you fall in love and that’s that.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, and therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: My heart is, and always will be, yours.
author: Sense and Sensibility

quote: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
author: Alfred Tennyson

quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
author: Joan Crawford

quote: The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.
author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Neitzsche

quote: A simple ‘I love you’ means more than money.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: I like to believe that love is a reciprocal thing, that it can’t really be felt, truly, by one.
author: Sean Penn

quote: When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It’s like death.
author: Dennis Quaid

quote: Love is blind. It will take over your mind. What you think is love, is truly not. You need to elevate your mind.
author: Eve

quote: And in the end, the love you take, is equal to the love you make.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone’s bad qualities because they somehow complete you.
author: Sarah Dessen

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
author: Author Unknown
